titleStmt.title: William Kirkland v. William Billings. Subpoena

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: William Kirkland v. William Billings. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: United States of America Territory of Washington Second Judicial District } ss

In the name of the United States you are hereby required to appear before Roger S. Greene Esquire, Dis- trict Judge at Chambers in the town of Olympia in Thurston County in the building known as the Land Office Building on Saturday the 7th day of September A.D. 1872 at the hour of 10 o'clock A.M. then and there to give evidence in a certain matter wherein the Territory of Washington is plaintiff and Wil- liam Kirkland is defendant and that you bring with you and produce then and there the record of your proceedings in the prelimi- nary examination of William Kirkland brought before you on the 12th day of May 1872 on the charge of murdering A.J. Campbell and all the evidence and writings which you have in your custody or power, concerning the premises.
Witness Roger S. Greene Esquire District Judge and the seal of said Court this 31st day of August AD 1872 J H Houghton Clerk
Received the within Sept. 3rd 1872 and Served the same by leaving a copy at the residence of H.D. Taylor Sept. 3rd
I hereby certify that the above service was performed in Chehalis County W.T. Wm O. McFarland Sheriff of Chehalis County W.T. per M.W. Fletcher Deputy
fees on the above, 80 cts Filed Sept 7 1872 J H Houghton Clerk
